statements.statement:
select A.* from sys_code_template A where 1=1 <#if query??> <#if query.key??> and ( A.id like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.project_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.content like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%'
or A.pkg like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.clazz like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%'
or A.tmpl_type = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)} or A.tmpl_resolve_type = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)} or A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' or A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.key)}%' ) </#if> <#if query.id??> and A.id = ${query.id} </#if>
<#if query.name??> and A.name like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.name)}%' </#if>
<#if query.code??> and A.code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.code)}%' </#if>
<#if query.projectCode??> and A.project_code = '${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.projectCode)}' </#if>
<#if query.content??> and A.content like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.content)}%' </#if>
<#if query.pkg??> and A.pkg like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.pkg)}%' </#if>
<#if query.clazz??> and A.clazz like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.clazz)}%' </#if>
<#if query.tmplType??> and A.tmpl_type = ${query.tmplType} </#if>
<#if query.tmplTypes??> and A.tmpl_type in (${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tmplTypes)}) </#if>
<#if query.tmplResolveType??> and A.tmpl_resolve_type = ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.tmplResolveType)} </#if>
<#if query.remark??> and A.remark like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.remark)}%' </#if>
<#if query.appCode??> and A.app_code like '%${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.appCode)}%' </#if>
<#if query.sortField?? && query.sortOrder??> order by ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortField)} ${StringUtil.escapeSql(query.sortOrder)} <#else> order by sn </#if> </#if>
